name: ttrpg-tools
description: API for generating random dice rolls, NPCs, towns, names, etc. for TTRPG campaigns.
author: Joseph H. Stoops

scripts.postbuild: cp README.md dist/README.md && cp LICENSE dist/LICENSE && cp package.json dist/package.json && cp package-lock.json dist/package-lock.json
scripts.publish:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish dist
